post.text: # Hi and welcome to my first blog post This blog site is something i've been coding for a while, using the *marked* library to parse markdown text. At first, it started with me testing out the marked library, then I noticed videos are not being embedded, so I spent time getting it to work Since it works now, here's a video of a cat named Maxwell. [video](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/822365198743896094/1086723680635211887/maxwell2.mp4) i (hate) love regex!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! # Comments and the backend Right now, I am not sure how to implement this since the backend server for this site is hosted with [repl.it](https://replit.com/). By default, the servers repl.it has are very bad. I get like 0.5 vCPUs, 512 MB of RAM, and 1,024 MBs of storage just for a server, and this is not enough for comments. The second problem is the account system, as it usually helps in reducing spam. I do not know what service to use for this, and even if I knew one, there's a high possibility it's either paid or not compatible for use with repl.it. UPDATE: [giscus](https://giscus.app/) is now being used for the comments. Read the post from 17/05/2023. # Why did I make this site Ever since I got access to the YouTube community tab, this seemed like the only way of posting updates for specific stuff and the channel. However, at 06/04/2023, YouTube randomly disabled my ability to make any new community posts. ![Community tab and the channel](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/822365198743896094/1093902201170178108/firefox_eJcxEtMRVw.png) This came out of nowhere and I still dont know why this happened # Source code This site is open-source on [GitHub](https://github.com/Voxelstice/voxelblog). The backend server is also open-source on GitHub. You are allowed to self-host this site all you want, but you have to credit Voxelstice (this project is simple but it took hours to make)

# Current issues
This blog site is still new, and kinda rushed, so there is issues with the site right now.

The current and important issue is the server to the post list. I wanted to use repl.it for the post list, which allowed me to easily make new posts (if I ever decide to make a post editor for my own use), but it had a major issue being the CORS. I kind of eventually figured it out but in the time of writing this, repl.it apparently has an active incident "Hosting is unstable and Redis connections are timing out". This may explain why I was having such issues, but as of now I've switched to using GitHub for the posts.

# Site update - v0.0.2a
Hi, I've released a update for this site, here are the changes:

- When there's a error in a post, it will have text below the post indicating a error has occurred.
- Added a topbar for the [voxelstice.github.io](https://voxelstice.github.io) site and this site

If you were wondering what happened to the profile pictures of my blog posts in this site, simply said, I changed my Discord profile picture which seemed to remove the regular profile picture I had from the Discord's servers (yes the link to my profile picture is just a Discord link)

I have not shared stuff for a while, but 2 weeks ago I made a NTM RBMK Simulator. [Check it out here](https://voxelstice.github.io/ntm-rbmk-simulator/)

Umm, the repl.it outage seems to have been fixed but I am probably not planning to use it for now

Oh by the way youtube seems to have gave my community tab access back, so I'll probably won't use this for a while but if there's anything major I need to share that I just can't fit into a single community post, it will be here

Testing out comments using [giscus](https://giscus.app/). If you are reading this and don't see any comments, you might be too early as im still figuring out how to get it working. giscus for this post has been disabled due to a issue where it will load the specific comment section from a new post

# SUMMER BREAK HAS STARTED WOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!
On the other hand, *when will i ever get a game idea i dont want to spend my entire summer break making prototypes*

and also im just causally doing dumb shit...
![boost fucking sucks boost fucking sucks boost fucking sucks](https://i.imgur.com/ILyXcxw.png)

in other words, is there any pros and cons between SDL2 and raylib? should i still continue using SDL2 for my game engine?

# Devlog?? Maybe!! I don't know what i'm exactly going for while making a game. I've kinda thought of having a factory-like game. You basically mine stuff and make a factory. and i also want to add space exploration Here's one video of the game [video](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/822365198743896094/1112074199784226836/game_JnA5ehA2En.mp4) This is just perlin noise, being used for ore generation. The little interface that you see on the left bottom corner is a [Dear ImGui](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui) interface. It's there mainly for determining which properties fit the most. Will I be making youtube videos for this? Maybe not. Maybe I will. i really need to fix the fact that the video won't embed depending on the character count, this WASN'T intentional. # Site update I spent time making some stupid post creator. Finally, the days of manually writing JSON are gone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! You can access it [here](https://voxelstice.github.io/voxelblog/post-creator). It's really useless for everyone else, but useful for me.

This site is currently a mess. Maybe someday i'll get to revamping this site completely

Might also have to use a different service for the comments, but it's likely it's because the comment sections are in one page.

I don't really use this that much so uhhh.............................................................
